briefdescription.para: Spice settings (nullptr if Spice is not used).

briefdescription.para: Vector of export settings (each element corresponds to an output file).

memberdef.definition: std::shared_ptr< propagators::SingleArcDynamicsSimulator< StateScalarType, TimeType > > tudat::json_interface::JsonSimulationManager< TimeType, StateScalarType >::dynamicsSimulator_
memberdef.name: dynamicsSimulator_

briefdescription.para: Absolute path to the input file.
Absolute path to the input file.
Original JSON object with all the settings read directly from the input file.
JSON object with the current settings.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor.
inputFilePath
Path to the root JSON input file. Can be absolute or relative (to the working directory).
initialClockTime
Initial clock time from which the cumulative CPU time during the propagation will be computed. Default is the moment at which the constructor was called.

Constructor.
jsonObject
The root JSON object.
initialClockTime
Initial clock time from which the cumulative CPU time during the propagation will be computed. Default is the moment at which the constructor was called.

briefdescription.para: Reset the root JSON input file.

detaileddescription.para:
Reset the root JSON input file.
inputFilePath
Path to the root JSON input file. Can be absolute or relative (to the working directory).

Reset the json object.
jsonObject
The new json object to be used for creating the simulation settings.

Run the propagation. Before running the simulation, the JSON representation of this will be exported if requested in applicationOptions_, and a message will be printed if requested in applicationOptions_. If some of the keys in jsonObject_ haven't been used, a message may be printed or an error may be thrown depending on applicationOptions_. After running the simulation, a message will be printed if requested in applicationOptions_.

briefdescription.para: Export the results of the dynamics simulation according to the export settings.

detaileddescription.para: Export the results of the dynamics simulation according to the export settings.

briefdescription.para: Export this as a json object.

detaileddescription.para:
Export this as a json object.
JSON representation of this.

briefdescription.para: Export this as a json object to the file exportPath.

detaileddescription.para:
Export this as a json object to the file exportPath.
exportPath
Path to which the contents of the JSON object are to be exported.
tabSize
Size of tabulations in the exported file (default = 2, i.e. 2 spaces). If set to 0, no indentantion or line breaks will be used, so the exported file will contain just one line.

briefdescription.para: Get original JSON object (defined at construction or last time setInputFile was called).

detaileddescription.para:
Get original JSON object (defined at construction or last time setInputFile was called).
The returned JSON object is the result of combining all the JSON files that may be included in the root JSON file into one single object containing all the settings, but before default values have been loaded or unit conversions have been applied.
The original JSON object.

Get the JSON object.
The returned JSON object is the result of combining all the JSON files that may be included in the root JSON file into one single object containing all the settings.
The JSON object.

briefdescription.para: Get maximum simulation end epoch. Returns TUDAT_NAN if there is no time termination condition.
Get Spice settings (nullptr if Spice is not used).
